title: Spack points to incorrect cray-libsci in LANL environment
body:
## Incorrect cray-libsci prevents builds of packages like `zlib`, `fftw`.

By default, HPC loads `cray-libsci/18.12.1`. Attempts to use `cray-libsci/18.11.1.2` fail as Spack insists upon using `cray-libsci/18.12.1`. 

## Steps to reproduce the issue
`$ spack install zlib % cce @ 9.0.0.23956`

### Platform and user environment

HPC: TRINITITE (LANL)
Compiler: cray@9.0.0.23596
Spack version: downloaded today

```
$ uname -a
Linux nid00037 4.4.103-6.38_4.0.153-cray_ari_c #1 SMP Thu Nov 1 16:05:05 UTC 2018 (6ef8fef) x86_64 x86_64 x86_64 GNU/Linux

$ lsb_release -d
Description:	SUSE Linux Enterprise Server 12 SP3

```
### Additional information

#### spack install cray-libsci
```
$ spack install cray-libsci  
SPACK_ENV_PATH = SPACK_ENV_PATH
==> cray-libsci@18.11.1.2 : has external module in cray-libsci/11.1.2
==> cray-libsci@18.11.1.2 : is actually installed in None
==> cray-libsci@18.11.1.2 : generating module file
==> cray-libsci@18.11.1.2 : registering into DB

```
#### Sticky environment variable
The variable **PE_LIBSCI_DEFAULT_VOLATILE_PKGCONFIG_PATH** points to the incorrect cray-libsci. Module operations like `swap` and `unload` don't change the value.

```
$ date
Thu May 16 14:36:14 MDT 2019
$ pwd
/lustre/ttscratch1/dantopa/repos/gitlab/pull-requests/tasks/crayons/zlib/spack-zlib
$ module load cray-libsci/18.11.1.2 
$ module list
Currently Loaded Modulefiles:
  1) modules/3.2.11.1                                  7) slurm/18.08.3-1                                  13) xpmem/2.2.15-6.0.7.1_5.11__g7549d06.ari          19) perftools-base/7.0.5
  2) craype-haswell                                    8) udreg/2.3.2-6.0.7.1_5.13__g5196236.ari           14) job/2.2.3-6.0.7.1_5.43__g6c4e934.ari             20) PrgEnv-cray/6.0.4
  3) craype-hugepages2M                                9) ugni/6.0.14.0-6.0.7.1_3.13__gea11d3d.ari         15) dvs/2.7_2.2.118-6.0.7.1_10.2__g58b37a2           21) Base-opts/2.4.135-6.0.7.1_5.6__g718f891.ari
  4) craype-network-aries                             10) pmi/5.0.14                                       16) alps/6.6.43-6.0.7.1_5.45__ga796da32.ari          22) cray-libsci/18.11.1.2
  5) craype/2.5.16                                    11) dmapp/7.1.1-6.0.7.1_5.45__g5a674e0.ari           17) rca/2.2.18-6.0.7.1_5.47__g2aa4f39.ari
  6) cray-mpich/7.7.4                                 12) gni-headers/5.0.12.0-6.0.7.1_3.11__g3b1768f.ari  18) atp/2.1.3
$ env | grep 18.12
PE_LIBSCI_DEFAULT_VOLATILE_PKGCONFIG_PATH=/opt/cray/pe/libsci/18.12.1/@PRGENV@/@PE_LIBSCI_DEFAULT_GENCOMPS@/@PE_LIBSCI_DEFAULT_TARGET@/lib/pkgconfig
```
In spite of 
```
$ module show cray-libsci/18.11.1.2
...
setenv		 PE_LIBSCI_VOLATILE_PKGCONFIG_PATH /opt/cray/pe/libsci/18.11.1.2/@PRGENV@/@PE_LIBSCI_GENCOMPS@/@PE_LIBSCI_TARGET@/lib/pkgconfig 
...
```

#### Spack providers

```
$ spack providers blas
blas:
atlas  blis  blis  cray-libsci  essl  intel-mkl  intel-parallel-studio  netlib-lapack  netlib-xblas  openblas  veclibfort
$ spack providers lapack
lapack:
atlas  cray-libsci  intel-mkl  intel-parallel-studio  netlib-lapack  openblas  veclibfort
$ spack providers scalapack
scalapack:
cray-libsci  intel-mkl  intel-parallel-studio  netlib-scalapack
```
